title: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Founders Edition 8GB
description: Unleash the power of a classic with the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Founders Edition, a budget-friendly legend delivering smooth 1080p and solid 1440p gaming, powered by 8GB GDDR5 memory and the proven Pascal architecture. While it lacks ray tracing, its raw performance ensures high frame rates in esports, older AAA titles, and VR experiences, making it ideal for budget-conscious gamers and retro builds. This card shines in compact systems or secondary rigs, with modern connectivity via DisplayPort 1.4 and HDMI 2.0b. Upgrade your rig and enjoy NVIDIA's timeless value and efficiency in a sleek, single-fan blower design that's built to last.
